# public/llms.txt

# SkyFlyWithUs - Flight Booking & Travel Guides
# We provide flight comparisons, travel tips, and airline policy guides.

Title: SkyFlyWithUs
Description: A comprehensive travel platform for comparing flight prices, booking deals, and accessing expert guides on airline policies (cancellations, refunds, baggage, and upgrades).

# --- Core Navigation ---
# Main entry points for users and general site information.
- Home: https://skyflywithus.com/ (Landing page with search widgets and featured deals)
- About: https://skyflywithus.com/about (Company mission, values, and trust signals)
- Contact: https://skyflywithus.com/contact (Customer support channels, including email and phone)

# --- Flight Tools ---
# Functional pages for finding and booking air travel.
- Flights Search: https://skyflywithus.com/flights (Main search interface for finding flights)
- Flight Results: https://skyflywithus.com/flights/results (Dynamic search results showing real-time pricing and availability)

# --- Knowledge Base & Guides ---
# Educational content regarding travel rules and airline specific policies.
- Blog Index: https://skyflywithus.com/blog (List of all travel articles and guides)
- Airline Policies: https://skyflywithus.com/blog/category/airline-policies (Specific guides on refunds, cancellations, and baggage rules)
- Travel Tips: https://skyflywithus.com/blog/category/travel-tips (General advice for smarter travel)

# --- Technical & Legal ---
# Machine-readable data and legal disclaimers.
- Sitemap: https://skyflywithus.com/sitemap.xml (Complete list of all indexable URLs)
- Privacy Policy: https://skyflywithus.com/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://skyflywithus.com/terms
